snippet: The proposal created political problems for the Obama administration, with some Democrats joining Republicans in denouncing the changes, saying they would harm Medicare beneficiaries.
abstract: Obama administration, under pressure from patients, pharmaceutical companies and members of Congress from both parties, withdraws proposal that would have allowed insurers to limit Medicare coverage for certain classes of drugs; limitations would have included drugs used to treat depression and schizophrenia.
lead_paragraph: The proposal created political problems for the Obama administration, with some Democrats joining Republicans in denouncing the changes, saying they would harm Medicare beneficiaries.

headline.main: White House Withdraws Plan Allowing Limits to Medicare Coverage for Some Drugs
headline.print_headline: White House Withdraws Plan Allowing Limits to Medicare Coverage for Some Drugs

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations
